872180.name: Charm Tale
872180.description: Explore a fantastic world and see an enchanting story come to life in this exceptional puzzler from the creators of Magic Inlay. Disenchant the motionless figures covered with mosaics with the help of sparkling pieces of crystal. Moving from one wonderful place to another, you'll enjoy the process of inlaying mosaics and uncovering beautiful images. If you like fairytales, adventures and happy endings, this unforgettable puzzle is for you!
